snippet: The apartment fire killed a 23-year-old man, who a neighbor said used a wheelchair, and seriously injured the man’s mother, a spokesman for the Fire Department said.
abstract: Apartment fire in the Bronx kills 23-year-old disabled man and seriously injures man's mother; identities of both victims are withheld.
lead_paragraph: The apartment fire killed a 23-year-old man, who a neighbor said used a wheelchair, and seriously injured the man’s mother, a spokesman for the Fire Department said.

headline.main: Disabled Man Dies in a Fire in the Bronx
headline.print_headline: Disabled Man Dies in a Fire in the Bronx
